tool_description: Looks up a word in a dictionary and returns all translations with bilingual example sentences.
name: linguatools translate
title: linguatools translate

api_list.name: translate a word (new)
api_list.description: Looks up a word in a bilingual dictionary and returns all translations ordered by frequency. Optionally restricts the result for a given wordclass.

required_parameters.name: langpair
required_parameters.description: One of the following combinations (in lower case): de-en, de-es, de-nl, de-pl, de-it, de-cs, en-de, es-de, nl-de, pl-de, it-de cs-de

optional_parameters.name: wortart
optional_parameters.description: One of the following parts of speech (in upper case): ADJ, ADV, AUX, EIGENNAME, ITJ, PHRASE, PRON, PREP, PREP_ART, PTK, KONJ, MODAL, NOMEN, NUM, VERB
